title: I'm Lucky I'm Still Married - Whole House LAN Party
description: Thanks to Ubiquiti for sponsoring this video and making this happen! Check out all their networking gear today at   Buy a Ubiquiti UDM-SE:  Buy a Ubiquiti Switch XG:  Buy a Ubiquiti USW-EnterpriseXG-24:  Buy a Ubiquiti USW-Pro-Aggregation:  Buy a Ubiquiti U6-Enterprise Access Point:   We partnered with Ubiquiti to host our entire team, and their friends, at Linus' house for a massive 100 person LAN party.  Discuss on the forum:   Sign up and get notified when we release our Magnetic Cable Management System:   Buy an Infinite Cables Outdoor All-Weather Extension Cord:  Buy a SuperMicro SuperServer 5019D-FN8TP:  Buy a KIOXIA CD6-R U.3 NVMe SSD:  Buy a StarTech Dual M.2 PCIe SSD Adapter Card:  Buy an Infinite Cables Armored Fiber Bulk Cable:  Buy a FlexOptix Universal SFP28 BiDi Transceiver:  Buy a FlexOptix FLEXBOX Optics Configurator:  Buy a Minisforum UM790 Pro:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.   GET MERCH:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   EQUIPMENT WE USE TO FILM LTT:   OUR WAN PODCAST GEAR:   FOLLOW US  ---------------------------------------------------  Twitter:  Facebook:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Twitch:   MUSIC CREDIT --------------------------------------------------- Intro: Laszlo - Supernova Video Link:  iTunes Download Link:  Artist Link:   Outro: Approaching Nirvana - Sugar High Video Link:  Listen on Spotify:  Artist Link:   Intro animation by MBarek Abdelwassaa  Monitor And Keyboard by vadimmihalkevich / CC BY 4.0  Mechanical RGB Keyboard by BigBrotherECE / CC BY 4.0  Mouse Gamer free Model By Oscar Creativo / CC BY 4.0   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 LAN Party 1:35 Setup 3:02 Circuits 5:04 Tables 6:16 Ubiquiti UniFi Flex XG 6:48 Networking 8:40 LAN Cache 9:30 Drives 11:40 Theatre Room 12:02 LAN Show 12:35 Almost There 14:40 Networking Update 19:20 Moar Ethernet 20:00 Energy Consumption 22:10 Game Servers 24:17 Party Time
